Description: Garnet gem, set in a gold finger-ring, engraved with a bust of Victory.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (380)
Gem / Catalogue of Engraved Gems & Cameos, Greek, Etruscan & Roman in the British Museum (1172)
Acquisition notes: See GR Original Letters 1896-7 vol. 2 (M-Z), nos 491-493.
